FILE: cm360630v11.0.txt
DYAD: ROMANIA - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV967
DISPUTE(S): MID2828 MID2759 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180911
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180911

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2828 

TERRMID: MID2828 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2828 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2828 from Gibler 2018, an Iranian ship fired upon a Romanian tanker in 1987. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial MID in which Iran and Iraq routinely attacked tankers trading with the other country. 

MARITMID: MID2828 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2828 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2828 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2828 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2828 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2828 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2828 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID2759 

TERRMID: MID2759 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2759 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2759 from Gibler 2018, in 1988 Iran again fired on a Romanian tanker. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial MID in which Iran and Iraq routinely attacked tankers trading with the other country. 

MARITMID: MID2759 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2759 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2759 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2759 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2759 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2759 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2759 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:
